content.en: Automated organ segmentation: Researchers have been exploring the use of deep learning algorithms to automatically segment and identify organs in medical images such as CT scans. These algorithms, such as pixel-to-label deep learning and convolutional neural networks, are designed to accurately detect and segment anatomical structures. By utilizing these advanced algorithms, researchers aim to improve the efficiency and accuracy of organ segmentation, which can have significant implications for medical diagnosis and treatment planning.
content.da: Automatiseret organsegmentering: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af dyb læringsalgoritmer til automatisk at segmentere og identificere organer i medicinske billeder såsom CT-scanninger. Disse algoritmer, som fx pixel-til-label dyb læring og konvolutionelle neurale netværk, er designet til præcist at detektere og segmentere anatomiske strukturer. Ved at anvende disse avancerede algoritmer sigter forskerne mod at forbedre effektiviteten og nøjagtigheden af organsegmentering, hvilket kan have betydelige implikationer for medicinsk diagnose og behandlingsplanlægning.
